rules:
Rule ID: 1
Description: The solution must automate the entire process of requirement gathering and documentation, including ingesting unstructured data, interpreting context, extracting relevant information, generating formal requirements/user stories/specifications, ensuring regulatory compliance and traceability, and integrating outputs into enterprise tools.
Category: Operational
Severity: High
Applicable Standards/Regulations: ISO/IEC 27001:2013 (Information Security Management)

Rule ID: 2
Description: The system must use LangChain or CrewAI to manage agent workflows. It must also use OpenAI GPT-4 / Anthropic Claude, Jira API, Email integrations, and Vector store for document retrieval.
Category: Operational
Severity: High
Applicable Standards/Regulations: ISO/IEC 27001:2013 (Information Security Management)

Rule ID: 3
Description: The MVP must allow users to upload PDF/email transcripts, auto-generate 3 user stories + acceptance criteria, push to Jira, and store logs in a dashboard.
Category: Operational
Severity: Medium
Applicable Standards/Regulations: ISO/IEC 27001:2013 (Information Security Management)

Rule ID: 4
Description: The system must ensure PII redaction & anonymization pre-step, store audit logs in append-only DB or JSON, and provide role-based SME validation loop. It must be securely deployed in on-prem or VPC environments.
Category: Security
Severity: High
Applicable Standards/Regulations: GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation), ISO/IEC 27001:2013 (Information Security Management)

Rule ID: 5
Description: The project assumes that all users have access to the necessary enterprise tools and are familiar with their use. It also assumes that all regulatory documents are available for web scraping.
Category: Operational
Severity: Low
Applicable Standards/Regulations: N/A

Rule ID: 6
Description: The input data sources include meeting transcripts, emails, PDFs, and regulatory documents. The output data sources include formal requirements/user stories/specifications and audit logs.
Category: Data
Severity: High
Applicable Standards/Regulations: GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation), ISO/IEC 27001:2013 (Information Security Management)

Rule ID: 7
Description: All data collected, including unstructured data from various sources, context elements, structured requirements, and audit logs, must be securely stored and managed.
Category: Data
Severity: High
Applicable Standards/Regulations: GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation), ISO/IEC 27001:2013 (Information Security Management)

Rule ID: 8
Description: The system must comply with all legal and regulatory requirements of the jurisdictions in which it operates, including data protection and privacy laws.
Category: Legal
Severity: High
Applicable Standards/Regulations: GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation), ISO/IEC 27001:2013 (Information Security Management), local data protection and privacy laws.
